definition: to hang oneself
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]
to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum
pinyin: yi1 ku1 er4 nao4 san1 shang4 diao4

definition: don't insist on only taking one road to Rome (idiom)/there's more than one way to skin a cat
pinyin: bu4 yao4 zai4 yi1 ke1 shu4 shang4 diao4 si3

sentences.english: Balloons of all colours are hanging from the lights.
sentences.chinese: 五颜六色的气球从灯上吊下来。

sentences.english: Arlo Guthrie: Obie, did you think I was going to hang myself for littering?
sentences.chinese: 欧比，你觉得我会因为乱丢垃圾而准备上吊自杀吗？

sentences.english: Lift up the pilots bag from the pilot boat.
sentences.chinese: 把领航员的包从领航艇上吊上来。

sentences.english: She left the lantern pendent from the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 她让灯笼从屋顶上吊著。

sentences.english: She had hanged herself at daybreak.
The original work, o zion with wife embroider red xu girdle hanged himself in the bathroom.
sentences.chinese: 原来锡工阿徐用妻子绣的红腰带在厕所里上吊了。

sentences.english: I don't go for one thing, " he confides."
sentences.chinese: 我不会在一件事上吊着，”他吐露道。

sentences.english: Then the claim was that she had hanged herself.
It turned out the hotel's sole guest had just hanged himself in his room.
sentences.chinese: 原来是旅店里唯一的客人刚刚在房间里上吊自杀了。

sentences.english: Before she attempted the hanging, her family had grown increasingly worried about Ziggy.
sentences.chinese: 在她上吊之前，家里人就很担心瑞格了。

sentences.english: She hanged herself out of despair.
He may have hung himself, tormented by guilt, as reported in Matthew.
sentences.chinese: 马太福音中说他深受罪恶感折磨而上吊自杀。

sentences.english: When he hauled it up there was a great carp at the end of the hook.
sentences.chinese: 他把钓线拉上来，钩上吊着一条大鲤鱼。

sentences.english: Obie, did you think I was going to hang myself for littering?
sentences.chinese: 欧比，你觉得我会因为乱丢垃圾而准备上吊自杀吗？

sentences.english: Constance: Could you imagine someone being hanged because of something I said.
sentences.chinese: 你能否想象有人会由于我说的话而上吊自杀吗？

to kill oneself/suicide
to jump into a well (to drown oneself, esp. of ladies in fiction)
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
to attempt suicide/to court death
to take poison
to strangle
to hang oneself
to jump from a building (to kill oneself)/fig. to sell at a large discount (in advertising)
to commit suicide
cannot figure out/to be unable to take a lighter view/to take things too hard/to be depressed/to fret over trifles
to drown oneself by jumping into the river
to execute by hanging/to hang oneself
to die together in the name of love/to sacrifice oneself for love
to commit suicide by biting off one's tongue
